code: import*as U from'./util';export const picsumUrl=(width,height)=>`https://picsum.photos/${width}/${height}`;export const randomImage=function(){let w=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1000;let h=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:800;let delta=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:200;return picsumUrl(U.random(w,w+delta),U.random(h,h+delta));};export const randomAvatar=()=>{const size=U.random(200,400);return picsumUrl(size,size);};
